mapper.select: SELECT b.no, b.title, b.create_Date, b.viewCount, m.no, m.name, m.email FROM user2.board b JOIN user2.member m ON b.writer = m.email ORDER BY b.no DESC

SELECT b.no, b.title, b.create_Date, b.viewCount, b.CONTENT, b.VIEWCOUNT, b.PHOTO_IMAGE, m.no, m.name, m.email FROM user2.board b JOIN user2.member m ON b.writer = m.email WHERE b.NO = #{no} ORDER BY b.no DESC

SELECT b.no, b.title, b.create_Date, b.viewCount, b.CONTENT, b.VIEWCOUNT, b.PHOTO_IMAGE, m.no, m.name, m.email FROM user2.board b JOIN user2.member m ON b.writer = m.email WHERE b.title LIKE '%${searchWord}%' OR b.CONTENT LIKE '%${searchWord}%' ORDER BY b.no DESC
mapper.update: UPDATE user2.board SET VIEWCOUNT = VIEWCOUNT + 1 WHERE NO=#{no}
